title: How to use Midjourney to generate amazing images and art
description: Midjourney can conjure up impressive logos, artwork, and other graphics based on your own imaginative descriptions.

title: Gates, Musk, and Biden weigh in on the AI race debate

title: Microsoft adds Bing AI chat to SwiftKey keyboard for Android

title: ChatGPT is more like an 'alien intelligence' than a human brain, says futurist
description: Philip Rosedale says generative AI can perform superhuman tasks but lacks the human ability to reason.

title: Best MP3 players of 2023: Yes, they're still a thing

title: Samsung Galaxy S23 sales in Europe jumps by 1.5 times compared to S22
